items.title: Neon Moon
items.excerpt: There's a neon moon hanging over the street, the feed keeps going.
items.body: There's a neon moon hanging over the street, and the feed keeps going. Minimal words for maximal feeling.

items.title: The Quiet Garden.
items.excerpt: We live in a time when openness feels like a kind of currency.
items.body: We live in a time when openness feels like a kind of currency. Not every part of our lives is meant for display.

items.title: Echoes of Palme: A Return to Swedish Politics.
items.excerpt: Returning to Sweden after more than a decade away feels like re-learning a language.
items.body: Returning to Sweden after more than a decade away feels like re-learning a language I used to know by heart.
